text: 1.8 1 Ko 16.22 Klays takaw teplep nɨbop agñɨnok ak, takaw nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl ak agñɨnok. Pen chɨn takaw teplep anɨb ak ke agonɨgabun, mab ke yɨneb ayaŋ pɨsnep amnɨgun. Akaŋ ensel God man ne alaŋ nɨb olap apɨl, takaw teplep anɨb ak ke agenɨgab, mab ke yɨneb ayaŋ pɨsnep amnɨmuŋ. Takaw anɨb okok takaw yepɨs.
